explains: n. 巴斯克人（居住在西班牙北部和法国南部）；巴斯克语
adj. 巴斯克人的；巴斯克语的

sentences.en: Spanish police say they have arrested ten people suspected of being members of the Basque separatist movement.
sentences.cn: 西班牙警方说，他们已经逮捕了10名巴斯克独立运动的嫌疑分子。

sentences.en: In fact, 80% of Spain's machine tools are from the Basque Country.
sentences.cn: 事实上，西班牙80%的机床都来自巴斯克地区。

sentences.en: The mise-en-scène chosen by the leaders of ETA, the armed Basque separatist group, for their video declaration yesterday was very familiar.
sentences.cn: 巴斯克武装分离主义集团“埃塔”（ETA）组织的领导人昨天发布视频声明时所选用的现场布景非常眼熟。
